org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan

Class OperatorAlternative

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.OperatorBase
      • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.OperatorAlternative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompositeOperator, Operator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoopHeadAlternative

    public class OperatorAlternative
extends OperatorBase
implements CompositeOperator
    This operator encapsulates operators that are alternative to each other.

    Alternatives and their interfaces (i.e., OutputSlots and InputSlots) are matched via their input/output indices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OperatorAlternative.Alternative
      Represents an alternative subplan for the enclosing OperatorAlternative.

      static OperatorAlternative wrap(Operator operator)
      Wraps an Operator: Creates a new instance that mocks the interface (slots) of the given operator, steals the connections from the given operator, adapts its parent and becomes its new parent. Moreover, the given operator is set up as the first alternative.

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static OperatorAlternative wrap(Operator startOperator,
                                       Operator endOperator)

      • wrap

        public static OperatorAlternative wrap(Operator operator)
        Wraps an Operator:
        1. Creates a new instance that mocks the interface (slots) of the given operator,
        2. steals the connections from the given operator,
        3. adapts its parent and becomes its new parent.
        4. Moreover, the given operator is set up as the first alternative.
        Parameters:
        operator - operator to wrap

      • getAlternatives

        public java.util.List<OperatorAlternative.Alternative> getAlternatives()

        Adds an OperatorAlternative.Alternative to this instance.
        Parameters:
        alternativeOperator - either an ElementaryOperator or a Subplan; in the latter case, the Subplan will be "unpacked" into the new OperatorAlternative.Alternative
